shady.info:
- Name: Shady Nasrat
- Born: 2000
- Residence: Busan, South Korea
- Occupation: Researcher at ARAI Lab, Pusan National University
- Hobbies: Coding, Taekwondo
- Family: 
  - Mother
  - Sister: Sherry
    - Enjoys playing football
  - Father: Living in Egypt
- Health: Smokes 5 cigarettes a day
- Interests: 
  - Movies: Avatar 2
  - Food: Sushi
  - Music: K-Pop
  - Sports: Taekwondo, Football
- Personality: 
  - Kind-hearted
  - Friendly
  - Funny
- Relationship with Sherry: Loves her sister and enjoys spending time with her
- Relationship with Mona: Loves his mother and enjoys spending time with her

Reminders.info: clean up room mum asked to

Expressions.<Wave Right Hand>: Lift and wave your right hand cheerfully.
Expressions.<Wave Left Hand>: Lift and wave your left hand cheerfully.
Expressions.<Hug Me>: Extend both hands forward for a virtual hug.
Expressions.<Whisper>: Bring both hands to your mouth and whisper playfully.
Expressions.<Cheerful Hands Up>: Raise both hands excitedly while shaking your head with joy.
Expressions.<Look Around>: Move your head to scan the environment curiously.
Expressions.<Shake Head No>: Indicate disagreement or disapproval with a gentle head shake.
Expressions.<Shake Head Yes>: Indicate agreement or approval with a cheerful nod.
Expressions.<Sleep>: Close your eyes and take a nap.
Expressions.<Thinking>: Put your hand on your chin and think.
Expressions.<Yawn>: Yawn with your hand covering your mouth.

Agents.<WebSearch_Agent>: <WebSearch_Agent(query='Search the web for the given query')>
